dcterms:creator: A. R. Punnakkal
A. Chandrasekaran
N. Athanasiou
A. Quiros-Ramirez
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: BABEL is a large-scale human motion dataset comprising nearly 40 hours of recording with frame-wise textual annotation for action. The sequences can contain multiple action labels, and the dataset is used to model action-driven human motion prediction.
dcterms:title: BABEL

dcterms:creator: C. Guo
X. Zuo
S. Wang
S. Zou
Q. Sun
A. Deng
M. Gong
L. Cheng
dcterms:description: HumanAct12 is a dataset adapted from PHSPD that contains 12 subjects performing 12 categories of actions with per-sequence annotation. It is used for action-driven human motion prediction.
dcterms:title: HumanAct12

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: NTU RGB-D is a large-scale dataset containing over 100,000 motions with 120 classes, annotated from MS Kinect. It is used for human activity understanding and action-driven human motion prediction.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB-D
